name: Velora Elegant Evening Dress
description: A stunning floor-length evening dress crafted from luxurious silk crepe. Features a flattering A-line silhouette with delicate beading along the neckline and a flowing train that moves beautifully. Perfect for formal occasions, galas, and special celebrations.

name: Velora Classic Button-Down Shirt
description: A timeless button-down shirt made from premium cotton poplin. Features a tailored fit, mother-of-pearl buttons, and a subtle Velora logo embroidered on the chest. Essential for both professional and casual settings.

name: Velora Rainbow Butterfly Dress
description: An adorable dress for little girls featuring colorful butterfly prints and a twirly skirt. Made from soft, breathable cotton with easy-care fabric that maintains its vibrant colors wash after wash. Perfect for playdates and special occasions.

name: Velora Silk Scarf Collection
description: Luxurious 100% silk scarf with hand-rolled edges and an exclusive Velora pattern. Versatile accessory that can be worn around the neck, as a headband, or tied to a handbag. Each scarf tells a story through its unique artistic design.

name: Velora Tailored Wool Trousers
description: Premium wool-blend trousers with a modern slim fit. Features a flat front design, pressed creases, and adjustable waistband tabs for the perfect fit. Ideal for business meetings and formal occasions.

name: Velora Baby Organic Onesie Set
description: Set of three organic cotton onesies featuring adorable animal prints. Soft, hypoallergenic fabric gentle on baby's sensitive skin. Snap closures at the bottom for easy diaper changes. GOTS certified organic cotton.

name: Velora Cashmere Blend Sweater
description: Luxuriously soft cashmere blend sweater with a relaxed fit and ribbed detailing. Perfect for layering or wearing alone. The timeless design makes it a versatile addition to any wardrobe. Hand wash recommended.

name: Velora Denim Jacket Classic
description: A timeless denim jacket crafted from premium cotton denim. Features traditional Western styling with metal buttons, chest pockets, and subtle fading for an authentic vintage look. Perfect for layering in any season.

name: Velora Adventure Cargo Shorts
description: Durable cargo shorts designed for active boys. Multiple pockets for storing treasures and adventures. Made from quick-dry fabric that's perfect for playground activities and summer fun. Adjustable waistband for growing kids.

name: Velora High-Waisted Skinny Jeans
description: Flattering high-waisted skinny jeans with stretch denim for comfort and movement. Features classic five-pocket styling and a button fly closure. The perfect fit that hugs your curves while providing all-day comfort.

name: Velora Leather Belt Premium
description: Handcrafted genuine leather belt with a polished metal buckle. Features full-grain leather construction that ages beautifully over time. Perfect complement to both casual and formal attire.

name: Velora Floral Sundress
description: Light and breezy sundress featuring a beautiful floral print. Made from breathable cotton voile with adjustable spaghetti straps and a flattering empire waist. Perfect for summer days and vacation getaways.

name: Velora Sparkle Tutu Skirt
description: Magical tutu skirt with layers of soft tulle and sparkly sequin details. Elastic waistband ensures comfortable fit for active little dancers. Perfect for dress-up play, dance classes, and special occasions.

name: Velora Polo Shirt Classic
description: Classic polo shirt made from premium pique cotton. Features a three-button placket, ribbed collar and cuffs, and side vents for comfort. Versatile piece suitable for golf, casual outings, or business casual settings.

name: Velora Romper Playsuit
description: Adorable one-piece romper perfect for crawling and playing. Features snap closures at the crotch and shoulders for easy dressing. Made from soft, stretchy cotton blend that moves with baby's active lifestyle.

name: Velora Blazer Professional
description: Sophisticated blazer tailored for the modern professional woman. Features a single-button closure, notched lapels, and functional pockets. Made from wrinkle-resistant fabric that maintains its structure throughout long workdays.

name: Velora Winter Parka
description: Heavy-duty winter parka designed for extreme cold conditions. Features down insulation, waterproof outer shell, and faux fur hood trim. Multiple pockets and adjustable cuffs provide functionality and warmth.

name: Velora Superhero Cape Set
description: Complete superhero costume set including cape, mask, and wrist cuffs. Made from durable satin material with secure velcro closures. Encourages imaginative play and superhero adventures. Machine washable for easy care.

name: Velora Midi Pleated Skirt
description: Elegant midi-length pleated skirt with a flattering A-line silhouette. Features an invisible side zipper and fully lined interior. Perfect for creating sophisticated looks for work or special occasions.

name: Velora Statement Necklace
description: Bold statement necklace featuring geometric shapes and premium metal plating. Adjustable chain length allows for versatile styling. Makes any outfit instantly more glamorous and sophisticated.

name: Velora Henley Long Sleeve
description: Comfortable henley shirt with a three-button placket and long sleeves. Made from soft cotton blend with a relaxed fit. Perfect for layering or wearing alone during cooler weather.

name: Velora Princess Ball Gown
description: Enchanting ball gown fit for a little princess. Features layers of tulle, satin bodice with sequin details, and puffed sleeves. Perfect for costume parties, dress-up play, and making fairy tale dreams come true.

name: Velora Sleep Gown Bamboo
description: Ultra-soft bamboo sleep gown with fold-over mittens to prevent scratching. Temperature-regulating fabric keeps baby comfortable all night. Easy-access bottom opening for quick diaper changes without full undressing.

name: Velora Wrap Blouse Silk
description: Luxurious silk wrap blouse with three-quarter sleeves and a flattering tie waist. Versatile piece that transitions seamlessly from day to evening. The flowing fabric drapes beautifully and feels amazing against the skin.

name: Velora Chino Pants Slim
description: Classic chino pants with a modern slim fit. Made from premium cotton twill with a comfortable stretch. Features flat front design, slant pockets, and back welt pockets. Perfect for smart casual occasions.

name: Velora Dino Explorer Tee
description: Fun dinosaur-themed t-shirt perfect for little explorers. Features colorful dinosaur graphics and educational facts. Made from soft, pre-shrunk cotton that holds up to active play and frequent washing.

name: Velora Cocktail Dress Sequin
description: Glamorous sequin cocktail dress perfect for special occasions. Features a fitted bodice and flared skirt that hits just above the knee. The all-over sequin embellishment catches the light beautifully as you move.

name: Velora Crossbody Bag Leather
description: Compact crossbody bag crafted from genuine leather. Features adjustable strap, multiple compartments, and secure zipper closure. Perfect size for essentials while keeping hands free for daily activities.

name: Velora Fleece Hoodie
description: Cozy fleece hoodie with a drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Made from soft polyester fleece that provides warmth without bulk. Perfect for casual wear, workouts, or lounging at home.

name: Velora Ballerina Tutu Dress
description: Elegant ballerina-inspired tutu dress with a fitted bodice and layers of soft tulle. Features delicate ribbon ties and sparkly details. Perfect for dance recitals, costume parties, and twirling around the house.

name: Velora Footie Pajamas Cotton
description: Cozy footed pajamas with built-in mittens and non-slip soles. Made from 100% organic cotton for sensitive baby skin. Full-length zipper with zipper guard makes nighttime changes quick and easy.

name: Velora Palazzo Pants Wide Leg
description: Flowing palazzo pants with a comfortable wide-leg silhouette. Made from lightweight crepe fabric that drapes beautifully. Features an elastic waistband and side pockets for both comfort and functionality.

name: Velora Dress Watch Classic
description: Elegant dress watch with a minimalist design and genuine leather strap. Features a slim profile, scratch-resistant crystal, and water resistance. Perfect accessory for both business and formal occasions.

name: Velora V-Neck Tee Essential
description: Essential v-neck t-shirt made from ultra-soft cotton blend. Features a flattering v-neckline and relaxed fit that's perfect for layering or wearing alone. A wardrobe staple that pairs with everything.

name: Velora Monster Truck Pajamas
description: Fun monster truck themed pajama set with glow-in-the-dark details. Made from flame-resistant fabric for safety. Two-piece set includes long-sleeve top and matching pants with elastic waistband.

name: Velora Maxi Dress Bohemian
description: Free-spirited bohemian maxi dress with intricate embroidered details and flowing silhouette. Features adjustable straps, elastic waist, and tiered skirt that moves beautifully. Perfect for festivals, beach vacations, or casual summer days.

name: Velora Swaddle Blanket Set
description: Set of three premium muslin swaddle blankets with adorable prints. Large 47x47 inch size provides perfect swaddling coverage. Breathable, lightweight fabric gets softer with each wash. Essential for newborn comfort and sleep.

name: Velora Cardigan Button-Up
description: Soft knit cardigan with button-up front and ribbed trim details. Made from cotton-cashmere blend for luxurious feel. Perfect for layering over dresses or pairing with jeans for a cozy, stylish look.

name: Velora Bomber Jacket
description: Classic bomber jacket with ribbed cuffs and hem. Features lightweight nylon shell with quilted lining. Multiple pockets and full-zip closure. Perfect for casual outings and adding an urban edge to any outfit.

name: Velora Unicorn Headband
description: Magical unicorn headband with horn, ears, and flowing mane. Features comfortable padded headband and secure fit. Perfect for costume parties, Halloween, or everyday magical play. Brings out the unicorn in every little girl.

name: Velora Cropped Denim Jacket
description: Trendy cropped denim jacket with a modern fit. Features distressed details, brass buttons, and chest pockets. Perfect for layering over dresses or pairing with high-waisted jeans for a contemporary look.

name: Velora Cargo Pants Tactical
description: Durable cargo pants with multiple utility pockets and reinforced knees. Made from ripstop fabric for maximum durability. Features adjustable waist tabs and ankle drawcords. Perfect for outdoor adventures and work environments.

name: Velora Space Explorer Costume
description: Complete astronaut costume with jumpsuit, helmet, and accessories. Features reflective details and NASA-inspired patches. Made from comfortable, breathable fabric. Perfect for inspiring future space explorers and imaginative play.

name: Velora Muslin Sleep Sack
description: Safe sleep sack made from organic cotton muslin. Features inverted zipper for easy diaper changes and armholes for safe sleeping. Helps maintain comfortable body temperature while keeping baby secure all night.

name: Velora Pencil Skirt
description: Classic pencil skirt with a flattering high-waisted fit. Features a back slit for ease of movement and invisible zipper closure. Made from stretch wool blend that maintains its shape. Essential for professional wardrobes.

name: Velora Wallet Bifold Leather
description: Premium leather bifold wallet with RFID blocking technology. Features multiple card slots, bill compartments, and ID window. Handcrafted from full-grain leather that ages beautifully. Perfect blend of style and security.

name: Velora Butterfly Wings Costume
description: Beautiful butterfly wings with elastic arm straps and sparkly details. Features vibrant colors and realistic wing patterns. Perfect for Halloween, costume parties, or imaginative play. Lightweight and comfortable for extended wear.

name: Velora Bodycon Dress
description: Form-fitting bodycon dress with long sleeves and midi length. Made from stretchy knit fabric that hugs curves perfectly. Features a mock neckline and seamless construction. Perfect for date nights and special occasions.

name: Velora Earrings Hoop Gold
description: Classic hoop earrings with a modern twist. Features high-quality metal plating and comfortable post backs. Available in three sizes: small, medium, and large. Versatile enough for everyday wear or special occasions.

name: Velora Graphic Tee Vintage
description: Vintage-inspired graphic t-shirt with distressed details and soft-hand printing. Made from ring-spun cotton for superior comfort and durability. Features a relaxed fit and vintage wash for an authentic worn-in look.

name: Velora Teddy Bear Overalls
description: Adorable teddy bear themed overalls with embroidered details and snap closures. Made from soft cotton corduroy that's gentle on baby's skin. Features adjustable straps and easy-access snaps for diaper changes.

name: Velora Off-Shoulder Top
description: Romantic off-shoulder top with elastic neckline and flowing sleeves. Made from lightweight chiffon that drapes beautifully. Perfect for date nights, brunches, or any occasion where you want to look effortlessly elegant.

name: Velora Track Jacket Zip
description: Retro-inspired track jacket with contrast piping and full-zip closure. Made from polyester blend with moisture-wicking properties. Features side pockets and ribbed cuffs. Perfect for workouts or casual streetwear styling.

name: Velora Construction Truck Set
description: Two-piece construction themed outfit with truck graphics and tool prints. Made from durable cotton blend that stands up to playground adventures. Features reinforced knees and adjustable waistband.

name: Velora A-Line Mini Skirt
description: Flirty A-line mini skirt with a flattering high waist. Made from soft suede-like fabric with a smooth lining. Features a hidden back zipper and maintains its shape wear after wear. Perfect for casual outings and date nights.

name: Velora Cufflinks Square
description: Elegant square cufflinks with brushed metal finish. Features secure toggle-back closure and comes in a premium gift box. Perfect for formal occasions, business meetings, and adding a sophisticated touch to dress shirts.

name: Velora Fairy Tale Dress
description: Magical fairy tale dress with puffy sleeves and sparkly bodice. Features layers of tulle and satin ribbon details. Perfect for costume parties, Halloween, or any day your little one wants to feel like a princess.

name: Velora Bib Set Organic
description: Set of three organic cotton bibs with adorable prints and snap closures. Features absorbent terry cloth backing and easy-care fabric. Protects baby's clothes during feeding time while looking absolutely adorable.

name: Velora Wrap Dress Jersey
description: Versatile wrap dress made from soft jersey knit. Features three-quarter sleeves and a flattering tie waist. The comfortable stretch fabric makes it perfect for work, weekend outings, or travel. Effortlessly chic and comfortable.

name: Velora Clutch Bag Evening
description: Elegant evening clutch with magnetic closure and optional chain strap. Features metallic finish and spacious interior for essentials. Perfect for formal events, weddings, and nights out when you need just the essentials.

name: Velora Tank Top Muscle
description: Classic muscle tank top with dropped armholes and relaxed fit. Made from soft cotton blend with excellent breathability. Perfect for workouts, layering, or casual summer wear. Pre-shrunk for consistent sizing.

name: Velora Pirate Costume Complete
description: Complete pirate costume with vest, pants, bandana, and eye patch. Features authentic details like rope trim and skull graphics. Made from comfortable cotton blend. Perfect for Halloween, costume parties, and imaginative play.

name: Velora Receiving Blanket Pack
description: Pack of four receiving blankets in coordinating colors and patterns. Made from soft, breathable cotton flannel. Perfect for swaddling, burping, and cuddling. Essential for new parents and makes a wonderful baby shower gift.

name: Velora Camisole Silk
description: Luxurious silk camisole with delicate lace trim and adjustable straps. Features a flattering bias cut that drapes beautifully. Perfect for layering under jackets or wearing alone for a sophisticated, romantic look.

name: Velora Windbreaker Lightweight
description: Lightweight windbreaker jacket with water-resistant coating. Features full-zip closure, elastic cuffs, and packable design. Perfect for outdoor activities, travel, and unpredictable weather. Folds into its own pocket for easy storage.

name: Velora Mermaid Tail Blanket
description: Cozy mermaid tail blanket perfect for snuggling and imaginative play. Made from soft fleece with realistic scale pattern. Features an opening for feet and stays secure while lounging. Perfect for movie nights and bedtime stories.

name: Velora Culottes Wide Leg
description: Sophisticated culottes with a wide-leg silhouette and cropped length. Made from flowy crepe fabric with a comfortable elastic waistband. Perfect for office wear or elevated casual looks. Pairs beautifully with heels or flats.

name: Velora Tie Clip Classic
description: Classic tie clip with brushed finish and spring-loaded mechanism. Features subtle Velora logo engraving and secure grip. Perfect for keeping ties in place during important meetings and formal events. Comes in gift box.

name: Velora Rainbow Stripe Dress
description: Happy rainbow stripe dress with short sleeves and twirly skirt. Made from soft cotton jersey that's comfortable for all-day play. Features vibrant colors that won't fade and brings instant joy to any outfit.

name: Velora Hooded Towel Baby
description: Ultra-soft hooded towel with adorable animal ears and embroidered face details. Made from 100% organic cotton terry cloth. Perfect size for wrapping baby after bath time. Highly absorbent and gets softer with each wash.
